pages.text:
PRIVATE DINING VENUE
Embers is here to help you celebrate with a fine dining experience. Please be aware that any of our private dining rooms are reserved and secured with a signed, completed contract.
Embers has a minimum of $65 per person for a 3 – course menu or $75 per person for a 4- course menu for our private events. Beverages and gratuity not included in menu per person price.
No split checks.
At Embers, a classically trained chef, a Court of Masters Sommelier (wine expert) and a talented, professional staff will produce your event. Embers has over 14 years of experience and is well known for creating a truly memorable events at our restaurant or at your chosen site. We specialize in hosting private events such as weddings, rehearsal dinners, board meetings, retirement parties, anniversaries, and any personal or company event.
WE SPECIALIZE IN BUSINESS AND CORPORATE MEETINGS!
Parties with
up to 28 guests
, Embers will host in our Garden View Private Dining Room.
Parties with
30 – 50 guests
, Embers will host in our new Private Dining Room, The Wine Cellar.
For large parties,
50 – 90
guests, Embers will host in our Medallion Room.
Spark our Gastropub can host events also.
45
seated or
75
standing cocktail style.
Outdoor cocktail and dinner events
can also be held on our Garden Patio or in our Gastropub, Spark, by request.
No booking fees, but dining minimums apply
WE OFFER AN AWARD-WINNING FINE DINING EXPERIENCE FOR YOUR WEDDING OR REHEARSAL DINNER
Rehearsal Dinner parties or let us create a curated dining experience for your wedding day. We are Alachua County’s premiere private dining event space and caterer.
Parties with
up to 28 guests
, Embers will host in our Garden View Private Dining Room.
Parties with
30 – 50 guests
,  Embers can host in our new Private Dining Room, The Wine Cellar.
For large parties,
50 – 90
guests, Embers will host in our Medallion Room.
Spark our Gastropub can host events also.
45
seated or
75
standing cocktail style.
Outdoor cocktail and dinner events
can also be held on our Garden Patio or in our Gastropub, Spark, by request.
Contact Embers about renting our entire space for that
once-in-a-life-time event!
No booking fees, but dinning minimums apply.
Catering & Food Services
Embers also caters and has provided food and service for some of North Florida’s premier events, including:
Ronald McDonald Red Shoe Affair
Noche de Gala
VIVA! Haven Hospice
The Chamber of Commerce Annual Dinner
Embers off-site catering minimum is $6,500.
This is not a table reservation request; reservations are made by calling (352)380-0901.
Private dinning events are for groups larger than 12 and require a $65 (3-course) or $72 (3-course with passed appetizers) minimum per person menu. Our private dinning event menus are preset and do not include beverages, service fee, taxes or gratuity.
Please be aware that any of our private dining rooms are reserved and secured with a signed contract.
This submittal is to request an event. Our booking manager will respond with our contract if date is available.
Garden View Room (max 28 guests)
Monday- Wednesday
$1,000 min (Jan-Nov)/$1,500 (Dec)
Thursday-Saturday
$1,500 min (Jan-Nov) / $2,000 (Dec)
The Wine Cellar Room (max 52 guests)
Monday- Wednesday
$3,000 min (Jan-Nov)/$4,000 (Dec)
Thursday-Saturday
$3,500 min (Jan-Nov) / $4,500 (Dec)
The Medallion Room (max 90 guests)
Monday- Wednesday
$5,500 min (Jan-Nov)/$6,500 (Dec)
Thursday-Saturday
$6,500 min (Jan-Nov) / $7,500 (Dec)
Spark at embers (max 45 guests seated / 75 standing)
Monday- Wednesday
$4,500 min (Jan-Nov) / $5,000 (Dec)
Thursday-Saturday
$5,000 min (Jan-Nov) / $6,000 (Dec)
